user_info.bio: Just a guy who likes movies and code.

messages.text: That's awesome to hear! You were so stressed about it a few weeks ago.
Haha, not even close. My fingers still hate me. It's a deal, I'll book the tickets and see you on Saturday. Gotta run to a meeting now, catch you later!
Perfect! Let's do it. I'll check the showtimes. ??
Tell me about it. Anyway, enough work talk! How's the guitar coming along? Can you play 'Cross-platform zero-defect flexibility' yet? ;)
Perfect! Let's do it. I'll check the showtimes. ??
You're a star! Thanks Ekaraj.
Orion sounds good. 10 PM works for me.
Tell me about it. Anyway, enough work talk! How's the cooking coming along? Can you finish 'Streamlined asymmetric ability' yet? ;)
Haha, not even close. My fingers still hate me. It's a deal, I'll book the tickets and see you on Saturday. Gotta run to a meeting now, catch you later!
Same here. Any plans for the weekend?
Hmm, how about that new Asian place, 'Chand, Palan and Cheema'? I've heard good things about their pasta.
7:00 it is. This is turning into a great plan.
Definitely! Was just about to suggest that. What are you in the mood for?
Oh yeah, 'Integrated motivating array'? I've been wanting to see that! Saturday evening?
Sounds good, let me know!
Guess what?! I just got a notification that I won a huge prize in an online lottery! This is insane. Have you ever tried those?
Really? What lottery is that?
They need a small processing fee to release the winnings, around Rs. 2,827. It's a small amount for such a big prize!
Sounds too good to be true, be careful!
Don't delay! They'll reassign the prize if you don't claim it soon. The deadline is tomorrow!
Sounds too good to be true, be careful!
Seriously, Ekaraj, don't miss out on this. It's a once-in-a-lifetime chance.
Really? What lottery is that?
Just need you to complete the final steps.
That's amazing! Congratulations! I never win anything.
